PerfectNetExp.abs: 多孔菌Polypore fungi是指菌盖背面具有非褶状特征的一类大型真菌,多生长在倒腐木、立枯木及树桩上。研究表明,多孔菌具有广泛的生理活性,如抗肿瘤、抗病毒、止痛.

...多孔美丽海葵（学名：Calliactis polypores）为链索海葵科美丽海葵属的动物。在中国，分布于东海等海域，多附着于寄居蟹宿居的螺壳上。== 参考文献 ==reflistWikispecies|Calliactis polypores}.

means.word_mean: 1. woody pore fungi; any fungus of the family Polyporaceae or family Boletaceae having the spore-bearing surface within tubes or pores; the fruiting bodies are usually woody at maturity and persistent

auth_sentence.content: The fungus, F. ellipsoidea, is what mycologists call a perennial polypore - otherise known as a bracket fungus.
